ValidationRule.description: If a Brand Registration Case has already been Kicked Off, we require a reason for the change. This rule will not fire if the Case is being created or if it has not yet been kicked off.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Brand_Registration', OR(ISCHANGED(Due_Date__c), ISCHANGED(In_field_Date__c)), ISBLANK(Explanation_of_Change__c), NOT(ISCHANGED(Kick_Off_Brand_Registration__c)), Kick_Off_Brand_Registration__c=TRUE, ISNEW()=FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An explanation is required to change the Date. Please enter an explanation and try again.
